command

Class ResizeCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • command.Command
      • command.ResizeCommand

  • public class ResizeCommand
extends Command
    A command to resize a ResizableAndMovableVisualObject

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResizeCommand

        public ResizeCommand(ResizableAndMovableVisualObject<?> object,
                     int startX,
                     int startY,
                     int startWidth,
                     int startHeight,
                     int endX,
                     int endY,
                     int endWidth,
                     int endHeight)
        Constructs the Command
        Parameters:
        object - the VisualObject to resize
        startX - the initial x-coordinate
        startY - the initial y-coordinate
        startWidth - the initial width
        startHeight - the initial height
        endX - the x-coordinate to which the VisualObject should be resized
        endY - the y-coordinate to which the VisualObject should be resized
        endWidth - the width to which the VisualObject should be resized
        endHeight - the height to which the VisualObject should be resized
